QuestData.Title: Sympathizers Among the Shal'dorei
QuestData.Description: Elisande's decision to welcome the Legion into Suramar earned her plenty of enemies, though only some of us were bold enough to openly defy her.$B$BWe have allies in the city - we just don't know how many.$B$BI need you to make contact with a spell-fencer by the name of Silgryn. He is loyal to our cause, and has been lying in wait since our failed coup.$B$BHe patrols the western edge of the city. Address him by name and tell him our cause is not lost!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Silgryn in the Suramar Outskirts.
QuestData.RewardText: We should be safe to speak here for a moment.
